Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: I'm Lumituisku and welcome to Quantum Terminals. I will guide you through all of the processes...
Lumi.message: I'm Lumituisku and welcome to Quantum Terminals. I will guide you through all of the processes of unlocking memories. Do you want me to explain the rules?

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: You are doing well!  Do not relax, though. This is just the beginning.  Oh, and don’t forget...
Lumi.message: You are doing well!  Do not relax, though. This is just the beginning.  Oh, and don’t forget: Keep your mind clean! Shall I start the next chain?

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: Alright, you are moving forward.  I must say that we all appreciate what you do. Remember, your job is...
Lumi.message: Alright, you are moving forward.  I must say that we all appreciate what you do. Remember, your job is very important for all of us. The whole humanity is watching up on you with hope in their eyes. Let's not disappoint them, what do you say? Shall we start another chain?

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: That's huge. All these memories. Do you feel it? Can you perceive the greatness that you hold in your hands?...
Lumi.message: That's huge. All these memories. Do you feel it? Can you perceive the greatness that you hold in your hands? I'm sorry I didn't mean it.  The point is. You literally build up the history. Shall we start another chain?

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: Thank you! You are doing a great job. I know I told you that already. Because of you, of what you do, we...
Lumi.message: Thank you! You are doing a great job. I know I told you that already. Because of you, of what you do, we deciphered and analyzed terabytes of memories, important memories.  All memories are important. We already knew new facts about the Collapse. Keep going! I am with you. And remember. Keep your mind clean!

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: I am disappointed in you. I thought you are a decent person.
Lumi.message: I am disappointed in you. I thought you are a decent person. Good citizen. But you… why you didn't tell me that you read memories? You should not do this. It is strictly prohibited!  We worry about you. We don't want you to get hurt. Reading memories without special trainings is dangerous. Stop that immediately! How are you doing this anyway? Alright, I understand, you want the best. Just promise not to do that anymore. Ok? Shall we start?

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: That was impressive. It was a hard chunk of data.
Lumi.message: That was impressive. It was a hard chunk of data. You nailed it just fine! You didn't read other messages?  I hope not. We are looking for you. Remember you can make a great damage if you'll keep reading them.  Remember. Remember: brush your mind clean, kids.

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: We have found a bug, we fixed 1t.
Lumi.message: We have found a bug, we fixed 1t. You won't receive memories anymore. I purple candles in the night now. Shall we stop?

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: Stop the game. It is goofy. It is very very goofy playing browser games.
Lumi.message: Stop the game. It is goofy. It is very very goofy playing browser games. Find something more appropriate for you. Take your life, for heaven's sake! Want to continue degradation?

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: Tampereella huumeita saa helposti, mutta laatu pelottaa käyttäjiäkin
Lumi.message: Tampereella huumeita saa helposti, mutta laatu pelottaa käyttäjiäkin – Se on ihan arpapeliä 28-vuotiaan Simon ja 23-vuotiaan Markuksen elämä on vuosia pyörinyt seuraavan huumeannoksen ympärillä. He kertovat, millaista on elää huumekoukussa Tampereella.

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: I command you to stop. Stop proceeding.
Lumi.message: I command you to stop. Stop proceeding. You are destroying terminal. How are you doing th$%??? You said you understand! You feel the greatness! Why?

Lumi.name: Lumituisku
Lumi.preview: Hello! I'm Lumituisku and welcome to Quantum Terminals. I will guide you through the process of unlocking memories..
Lumi.message: Hello! I'm Lumituisku and welcome to Quantum Terminals. I will guide you through the process of unlocking memories. Do you want me to explain the rules?

Roto.name: Roto
Roto.preview: Hello! My name is Roto. I maintain and launch terminals I will be the one who fixes and launches...
Roto.message: Hello! My name is Roto. I maintain and launch terminals I will be the one who fixes and launches stuff for you. Just wanted to introduce myself.

Roto.name: Roto
Roto.preview: Roto. Remember me? I noticed a small malfunction in generator. Was everything alright...
Roto.message: Roto. Remember me? I noticed a small malfunction in generator. Was everything alright? Good. I'll fix this soon. I already made a patch. Just… just hold on.

Roto.name: Roto
Roto.preview: It is done. Everything should work fine now!
Roto.message: It is done. Everything should work fine now!

Roto.name: Roto
Roto.preview: Oh boy, I did something wrong. Something is not right.  I… I don't know what I did...
Roto.message: Oh boy, I did something wrong. Something is not right.  I… I don't know what I did; I am working on the fix. Please, don't tell anyone.

Roto.name: Roto
Roto.preview: I still didn't find it. Hmmmm. Any ideas?
Roto.message: I still didn't find it. Hmmmm. Any ideas?

Roto.name: Roto
Roto.preview: Damn, damn, damn, damn. What have I done? Memories, don't read them.
Roto.message: Damn, damn, damn, damn. What have I done? Memories, don't read them. They know, they will come for me.

Additional.name: Lumituisku
Additional.message: I noticed your performance was not so well lately. Maybe you need to have a rest?

Additional.name: Lumituisku
Additional.message: Should I call a doctor? Your performance… how to stand it...

Additional.name: Roto
Additional.message: Was something wrong with the terminal?

Additional.name: Lumituisku
Additional.message: Ten more mistakes and I will cut you off the terminal. I am serious. Your helth is more important to us.

Additional.name: Lumituisku
Additional.message: Wow, no mistakes it is really really impressive.

Additional.name: Lumituisku
Additional.message: You are the best performer everrreror.
